name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Dongping County, Tai'an, Shandong. This morning, a customized bus picking up students at the gate of Foshan Middle School rushed into a crowd of students going to school on the roadside, causing more than a dozen students to be killed or injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The scene was in a mess, with many people lying on the ground. The driver had been detained. Local authorities were urgently organizing the injured to be sent to the hospital for treatment. Insiders said: The ambulance went back and forth dozens of times, and the trees in front of the school were broken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Chinese official media reports, the accident caused 11 deaths and the cause of the accident is under investigation.
